title: Trying to ID an old font
content:
Hello -

Seeking to enlist the community's expert assistance.

Can anyone hazard a guess as to the type-face on this old leather nametag. Seeking to recreate the font for a project.

Many thanks in advance,

Blaze424

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720134712im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nametag_6399.jpg)
author: Blaze424

comments.content:
...or the font on this nametag, as well.
